main.name: Ali Rahimi
main.description:
Assign me with some tasks, I'll find the solutions and get it done.
Experienced in develpement of complex android applications with the old (JAVA) and "hot" stacks (Kotlin, Jetpack (MVVM, ROOM, DATABINDING, etc), DI (with Dagger) etc.
main.bio: Geek, Freelancer, Open Source Advocate, Linux Lover. Lover of Music and Cinema
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage:
I'm an engineer, I have an overview of many areas such as Software Engineering principles (OOP, user-centeric approach to design apps, Database Desgin, Software Architecture etc), Algorithms, Network Security (SSL, RSA, AES, etc), Network Layers (IP, TCP/UDP, etc).
 I don't really care about the STACK that much, but it should be at least a modern one, I won't work with ancient languages.

work.title: Full front-end Android Developer
work.description: The very first application I wrote with Android SDK. Artistic Pantomime Game/Application with cool UX and UI written in Java for android 2.1 to 4.0. The APK still works perfectly in android 10 !

work.title: IOS Developer
work.description: I learned native iOS development with Swift by developing an existing android application to iOS. I really liked and appreciated the Apple Architecture Design guidelines (MVC)

work.title: Full front-end Android Developer
work.description: Android Online and Offline Game/Application written in Java. Key features: Notifications for everything, Restfull and Web Sockets Communication With Server, Registration/Friend Management/Chat, Encrypted Coin System, Analytics and etc.

work.title: Front-end Android Developer
work.description: Smart Pledge System designed and implemented for funding a political party in malaysia. I implemented some basic data flow, authentication, subscribing to a payment plan and actual paying functionality with PayPall or Cards.

work.title: FullStack Developer
work.description: Persian Sign Language Learning Assistant Native Android Application for children with the use of Visual Learning techniques by providing videos and images. New learning modules could be added to the existing app from a node js server.

work.title: Full front-end Android and Android TV Developer
work.description: Complex Android and Android TV Application with a focus on the code quality and software architecture. Stack used in project:  Kotlin,MVVM,Databiding,RoomDB,WorkManager,Retrofit,Dependency Injection(Dagger) and Kotlin Coroutines. Worked and communicated in English with a European company, due to a strict NDA I'm not allowed to disclose any information on the nature of the app or the company.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
